Title: Freenet: Deanonymization Vulnerability
Synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in Freenet, which can lead to deanonymization due to path folding.

Background.Text: Freenet is an encrypted network without censorship.

Description.Text: This release fixes a severe vulnerability in path folding that allowed to distinguish between downloaders and forwarders with an adapted node that is directly connected via opennet.

Impact.Text: This release fixes a severe vulnerability in path folding that allowed to distinguish between downloaders and forwarders with an adapted node that is directly connected via opennet.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Freenet users should upgrade to the latest version:
